question: What is the procedure to buy a book?
answer: Browse, Search, Select a book, Complete the Payment, and get it delivered to your doorsteps.

question: What if I want to cancel an order?
answer: Padhega India is engineered to process and ship orders as quickly as possible, the orders cannot be canceled once placed. Books purchased through Padhega India are sold strictly on an as-is basis and are not subject to return or refund.

question: How do I cancel my order?
answer: You can cancel your order as long as it has not been shipped yet. The Your Orders section in your account allows you to generate a cancellation request and request a refund.

question: What is the refund process?
answer: Refunds will be processed within 14-21 working days and credited to your bank account. If you prefer an instant refund, it can be processed directly to your Padhega India wallet, which can be used for future purchases.

question: Can I cancel or get a refund for an order that has been shipped and delivered without any defects or issues?
answer: Orders that have been shipped and delivered without any defects or issues are not eligible for cancellation or refund.

question: How do I pay for the book?
answer: You can pay by any online payment mode you are comfortable with or using the PI wallet.

question: Is my data secured?
answer: Yes. We do not disclose our customer's details unless required by law. For any other queries mail us at support@padhegaindia.in

question: How do you assure No Piracy and only original books?
answer: We procure books directly from Publishers to assure the originality of the book.

question: Do you ship outside India too?
answer: Yes! We ship in more than 100+ countries across the world with cost-effective shipping options.

question: How can I confirm if my order has been affirmed?
answer: As soon as payment is done, You will receive an email from our side about Order confirmation and Shipping details. If the book is to be procured and may take a little time, our customer care executives will reach you by email and call to inform you about the same.

question: Do I need to have an account and login for shopping?
answer: Yep, it is suggested that you create an account on our website. The account creation will save your primary information which may be needed for all future orders ahead. An account will help us suggest books as per your taste and buying history.

question: What is PI Wallet and how it is useful?
answer: PI Wallet is your personalized kitty to save and buy books with better savings. You can create PI wallet for yourself or even gift it to your loved ones. For every recharge you do for your PI wallet we also add a predefined amount from our side. Every time you buy a book you can select option to pay from your PI Wallet. Ease to create wallet, recharge wallet and use wallet - makes whole book buying experience seamless and faster.

question: What is #PIRecommends ?
answer: The books we find really amazing, we add #PIRecommends to it. You can browse through amazing books in this section to know more.

question: Once the order is placed, how much time it will take to deliver the order?
answer: The book will be shipped within 1-4 working days. Depending on where you are and the available delivery options, it should arrive within 3-7 working days.

question: Once I place a Pre Order for any book, When will I get the book? How much time it will take to deliver the order?
answer: Once you have placed a Pre Order for the book, we will register your order on your end. As soon as the Book is procured we will ship the book and also inform you accordingly. Keep assured we are more excited to ship you the book!

question: How to check the status of the order once the order is placed?
answer: As soon as the order is placed, till it is delivered to your doorsteps, you will get regular updates about your order on your registered WhatsApp number and email address.

question: What will happen to my order if my package is not delivered and gets RTO?
answer: If due to a mistake from the shipment partner, your package is not delivered, we will make sure to ship you another book ensuring it reaches you on time. Rest assured- our prime concern is your satisfaction and the best buying experience for you.

question: How can I request for a book not available?
answer: If you don't get the book you are searching for on our website, please leave a request in the “Request a book” section and we will connect with the publisher and try to procure the book.

question: I am a regular customer who has purchased many books from your website and also have a PI membership. Can my old order history be added to my member account so I can earn rewards and points for those previous purchases as well?
answer: No, once you take Padhega India membership, reading points and rewards start from that point forward. You will receive points and rewards for all purchases made after the membership, but not for previous orders.

question: Can I expect any wear and tear on the pages?

question: What does Excellent condition mean?
answer: Excellent means the book is almost new and has been sparingly used.

question: What does Very Good condition mean?
answer: Very Good means the book is attractive and fresh-looking with only minor wrinkling.

question: What does Good condition mean?
answer: Good means the book is old but well-maintained. Sometimes, it can include fresh-looking books with minor repairs.
